text: Vlado Matanović (born 29 May 1995) is a Croatian handball player for RK Gorenje Velenje and the Croatian national team.EHF profile He represented Croatia at the 2020 European Men's Handball Championship.2020 European Men's Handball Championship squad ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Rijeka Category:Croatian male handball players Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Croatian expatriate sportspeople in Slovenia
title: Vlado Matanović
